866307 Rafael Sampaio


1) 

 A) C1,6 (1011(2)) =  C1(01101)  = 10010(2)
 B) C1,8 (1102(2)) =  C1(00001100(2)) = 11110011(2)
 C) C2,6 (100011(2)) = C1(011100) + C2(+1) = 011101(2)
 D) C2,7 (101001(2)) = C1(1101001) + C2(+1) = 0010111(2)
 E) C2,8 (111010(2)) = C1(11111010) + C2(+1) = 00000110(2)

2)

 A) C1,6 (123(4)) =  C1(011011(2))= 100100(2)
 B) C1,8 (C4(16)) =  C1(11000100(2)) = 00111011(2)
 C) C2,6 (312(4)) =  C1(110110(2)) -> 001001(2) = C2(+1) = 001010(2)
 D) C2,10(153(8)) =  C1(0001101011(2)) -> 1110010100(2) = C2(+1) = 1110010101(2)
 E) C2,8 (7D(16)) =  C1(01111101(2)) -> 10000010(2) = C2(+1) = 10000011(2)

3)

 A) 1_0101(2) -> -1 = 1_0100(2) = 0_1011 = 11(10)
 B) 1_10101(2) -> -1 = 1_10100(2) = 0_01011 = 11(10)
 C) 1_00110(2) -> -1 = 1_00101(2) = 0_11010 = 011010(2)
 D) 1_010111(2) -> -1 = 1_010110(2) = 0_101001 = 0101001(2)
 E) 1_110101(2) -> -1 = 1_110100(2) = 0_001011 = B(16)

4)

OBS(O complemento de dois já está feito na conversão para binário)

 A) 110000(2) - resposta
 B) 101,1001(2) - 10,01(2) -> 101,1001 + 101,1100 = 1011,0101(2)
 C) 321(4) - 213(4) -> 111001(2) + 011001(2) = 010010(2) = 102(4)
 D) 354(8) - 265(8) -> 011101100(2) + 101001011(2) = 00110111(2) = 67(8)
 E) 6A2(16) - C14(16) -> 011010100010(2) + 001111101100(2) = 101010001110(2) = A8E(16)

5)


 A) 110110(2) – 1101(2) = 00110110(2) + 11110011 = 1_00101001(2) = +41(10) = +51(8)
 B) 101,1011(2) – 3,4(8) = 0101,1011(2) + 1100,1000(2) = 10010,0011(2) = -18,1875(10) = -22,1(8)
 C) 231(4) – 3A(16) = 00101101(2) + 11000110(2) = 11110011(2) = - 13(10)
 D) D3(16) – 1011101(2) = 11010011(2) + 0100011(2) = 01101110(2) = 110(10) 
 E) 5E(16) – 3C(16) = 01011110(2) + 11000100(2) = 101000010(2) = 66(10)
